term.title: becquerel

item.text: SI derived unit of radioactivity equal to one disintegration per second; admitted for reasons of safeguarding human health, symbol: Bq.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 2513. 'Nomenclature for radioanalytical chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 2516 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466122513)
